name: Radioactive Bubble Boy
description:
I started creating this in Ludum Dare 34. Theme tied as "Growing" and "Two Button Control".

In main menu use Mouse. In-game use Left and Right arrow keys. Press Escape to return to main menu.

Changes compared to LD34 version:

  • Tighter controls
  • Tutorial level
  • Character size is tiny bit smaller.
  • Some minor map changes.
